parts.text: {"word":"transported","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"輸送する、運搬する","english_definition":"to take or carry (someone or something) from one place to another by means of transport.","examples":[{"sentence":"The goods are transported by truck.","translation":"その商品はトラックで輸送されます。"},{"sentence":"The company transports oil by pipeline.","translation":"その会社はパイプラインで石油を輸送します。"},{"sentence":"Passengers are transported to the island by ferry.","translation":"乗客はフェリーで島へ輸送されます。"}],"collocations":["transport goods (商品を輸送する)","transport passengers (乗客を輸送する)","transport by truck/train/ship (トラック/列車/船で輸送する)"],"synonyms":["convey","carry","move","ship","transfer","haul"],"antonyms":["leave","abandon","store"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"（感情・想像力によって）心を奪われる、うっとりさせる","english_definition":""to fill (someone) with great delight; enrapture.","examples":[{"sentence":"The music transported her to another world.","translation":"その音楽は彼女を別世界へ心を奪った。"},{"sentence":"The beautiful scenery transported us.","translation":"その美しい景色は私たちをうっとりさせた。"},{"sentence":"She was transported by his words.","translation":"彼女は彼の言葉に心を奪われた。"}],"collocations":["transported by music (音楽に心を奪われる)","transported by scenery (景色に心を奪われる)","transported by joy (喜びに心を奪われる)"],"synonyms":["captivate","enchant","delight","thrill","enrapture","entrance"],"antonyms":["bore","disgust","repel"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"（歴史的に）追放刑にする、流刑にする (特にイギリスが植民地へ)","english_definition":"(historical) to send (someone) away to a penal colony as a punishment.","examples":[{"sentence":"He was transported to Australia for theft.","translation":"彼は窃盗でオーストラリアへ流刑にされた。"},{"sentence":"Many convicts were transported to the colonies.","translation":"多くの囚人が植民地へ流刑にされた。"}],"collocations":["transported to Australia (オーストラリアへ流刑にされる)","transported for life (終身流刑にされる)"],"synonyms":["exile","deport","banish","expel"],"antonyms":["welcome","receive"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「transportare」（向こう側へ運ぶ）から派生。trans-（向こう側へ）+ portare（運ぶ）。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/trænˈspɔːrtɪd/","syllables":"trans-port-ed"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["transport","transports"],"past_simple":"transported","past_participle":"transported","present_participle":"transporting"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**transported**」は動詞「transport」の過去形・過去分詞です。物理的な輸送、感情的な陶酔、歴史的な流刑という3つの主要な意味があります。文脈によってどの意味で使用されているかを判断する必要があります。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I was transported to see the movie.","correct":"✓ I was transported by the movie.","note":"感情的な意味で「心を奪われる」場合は、通常「by」を使います。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The transported prisoner.","correct":"✓ The transported prisoner was... / ✓ The prisoner was transported.","note":"「transported」を形容詞的に使う場合は、文脈を補足するか、受動態の文で使用します。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["transport (名詞: 輸送、運搬手段；動詞: 輸送する)","transportation (名詞: 輸送、交通機関)","transporter (名詞: 輸送者、運搬具)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"中頻度","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「**transported**」は「transport」（輸送する）の過去形または過去分詞です。基本的な意味は、人や物をある場所から別の場所に運ぶことです。例えば、「The goods were transported by train.（商品は列車で輸送された）」のように使います。また、比喩的な意味として、感情や想像力によって「心を奪われる」「うっとりする」という意味もあります。さらに、歴史的な文脈では、犯罪者を流刑地へ送るという意味もあります。文脈によって意味が異なるため、注意が必要です。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The furniture was **transported** to their new house.","translation":"家具は彼らの新しい家へ輸送された。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"輸送する"},{"sentence":"She was **transported** by the beauty of the sunset.","translation":"彼女は夕日の美しさに心を奪われた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"心を奪われる"},{"sentence":"Many prisoners were **transported** to penal colonies in the 18th century.","translation":"多くの囚人が18世紀に流刑地へ送られた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"流刑にする"}]}
